Body:
"""
        Test that an OperationNotSupported error is generated when invoking
        an operation not supported by the server.
        """
e = engine.KmipEngine()
e._logger = mock.MagicMock()
args = enums.Operation.POLL, None
regex = '{0} operation is not supported by the server.'.format(args[0].name
    .title())
six.assertRaisesRegex(self, exceptions.OperationNotSupported, regex, e.
    _process_operation, *args)
